title: Modern 1BR/1BA unit, walking distance from downtown San Carlos
app_fee: $40 - Credit Check, Background Check, Eviction Check, Processing
posting_body: Modern 1BR/1BA unit, walking distance from downtown San Carlos
525 Walnut Street - Unit 9 | San Carlos, CA 94070
Nestled on one of the finest streets just steps from Downtown San Carlos, CalTrain and beautiful Burton Park,this completely renovated apartment is built to impress.
Custom home finishes throughout will impress friends, family, and guests alike, while providing you with all the comforts you need.
We are also pet friendly and only two blocks away from City Hall Park, one of the few dog parks in the area that allows dogs to run off leash.
Apartment Features and amenities include: All stainless steel appliances, including dishwasher *  Cabinetry with custom quartz counters *Dual paned vinyl windows*
Modern, open floor plan with new wall to wall hardwood LVT flooring* New modern and designer finishes throughout*
Assigned covered parking and locking storage* Pet-friendly.
Pictures are of a similar unit
Tenant pays PG&E and water/garbage based on Ratio Utility Billing System
